snippet: The bill would have established optional standards for the computer systems that oversee critical infrastructure.
abstract: Cybersecurity bill that had been one of Obama administration’s top national security priorities is blocked by Republican filibuster in the Senate, severely limiting its prospects this year; bill would have established optional standards for computer systems that oversee critical infrastructure, like power grids, dams and transportation.
lead_paragraph: The bill would have established optional standards for the computer systems that oversee critical infrastructure.

headline.seo: Cybersecurity Bill Is Blocked by G.O.P. Filibuster
headline.main: Cybersecurity Bill Is Blocked in Senate by G.O.P. Filibuster
headline.print_headline: Cybersecurity Bill Is Blocked by G.O.P. Filibuster
